name: Rum Bullions Island Bar
description: Rum Bullions Island Bar sits partially inside Silver Legacy's iconic dome, offering tropical-inspired cocktails in a unique island setting on the casino floor. As Reno's only dedicated rum bar, it features an extensive rum selection with signature drinks like the flaming Kava Kava, plus Hurricanes, Mai Tais, and frozen daiquiris. The bar also features dueling pianos on Friday and Saturday nights and has a comfortable back patio with an island shack vibe.
shortDescription: Reno's only rum bar, beneath Silver Legacy's dome with tropical cocktails and dueling pianos.

faqs.question: Where is Rum Bullions?
faqs.answer: Beneath Silver Legacy's signature dome on the main casino floor.

faqs.question: What are the drink specialties?
faqs.answer: Tropical frozen drinks, rum cocktails, and island-inspired beverages.

faqs.question: Is it a full bar?
faqs.answer: Yes, while rum is the specialty, they serve a full range of cocktails, beer, and wine.

testimonials.quote: Rum Bullions Island Bar has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside silver-legacy-resort-casino. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Linda L.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Rum Bullions Island Bar are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Sean W.
